topic: Rendering with Radiance update on BookSurge/Amazon.com
body:
Hi All,


Chas has managed to get "Rendering with Radiance" back up on Amazon,  
which was apparently quite painful.  Thanks to his efforts, people  
can now order copies and expect to receive them faster than (n)ever.


Cheers,
-Greg
